name: Clement Le Biez
title: FullStack Web & Mobile Developer
introduction_1: Fullstack web and mobile developer with 6 years of experience, I'm passionated about developing accessible and powerful applications.
introduction_2: I'm a fan of the agile methodology and I master the design chain of an application from start to finish.
introduction_3: From the expression of user needs to front-end and back-end development including the deployment on an automated infrastructure.
